metadata.title: CVE-2021-3630 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability was found in DjVuLibre inDJVU::DjVuTXT::decode() in DjVuText.cpp via a crafted djvu file which maylead to crash and segmentation fault. This flaw affects DjVuLibre versionsprior to 3.5.28.

criterions.comment: djvulibre: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
